div.l: Ryȝt at þe entre of þe dore be hȳnde
Þᵘou schat a cake of half a buschel fȳnde
Þᵗat was I makyd ryȝt of þȳn owene mele
Which þᵗat I halp mȳn fadyr for to stele
And goode lemān god þe saue ⁊and kepe
And wᵗith þᵗat word sche gan almost to wepe
Aleyn vp ryst ⁊and thoughte er þān it dawe
I wele gon crepe in by mȳn felawe
And fond þe cradyl wᵗith hese hand a non
By god þouȝte he al wrong I haue mys gōn
Mȳn hed is toty of mȳn swynk to nyȝt
Þᵗat makyth me þᵗat I go not aryȝt
I wot wel by þe cradyl I haue mys go
Here lyth þe mellere ⁊and hese wyf also
And forth he goth a twēnty deleway
Vn to þe bed þ̉ere þᵗat þe mellere lay
He wende acrepid bi hese felawe Ion
And by þe mellere in he crepede a non
And cauȝte hȳm by þe nekke softe he spak
He seyde þᵘou Iohn þᵘou sweuenyst a wak
For cristis soule ⁊and here a nobele game
For by þᵗat lord þᵗat called is seynt Iame
As I haue thryes in þe schorte nyȝt
Swyuyd þe melleris douȝtyr bolt vp ryȝt
Whil þᵘou hast as a coward been a gast
Ȝa false harlot ꝙquod þe mellere hast
A false traytoᵘur false clerk ꝙquod he
Thow schat ben ded be godis dynete
Ho durste ben so bold to disparage
Mȳn douȝtyr þᵗat is comȳn of swych lenage
And by the throte bolle he caughte aleyn
And he hēnte hȳm dyspitously a geyn
And on þe nose he smot hȳm with hese fest
Doūn rān þe blod strēm vp on hese brest
And in þe floor wᵗith nose ⁊and mouth to broke
They walwe as don too piggis in a poke
